mixed-citation.article-title: First records and two new species of sipunculans (Sipuncula) from the Southern Mexican Pacific

tp:treatment-sec.p: 103–104, pl. 12, fig. 171, pl. 13, fig. 179, as Sipunculus vastus ; type locality: Jaluit , Marshall Islands (without details). — Cutler et al. 1992: 154 ( Isla del Caño, Costa Rica , under boulders and in debris coral). — Dean 2001: 86–87 (same data as preceding). Questionable records in the TEP.
